Summary •	A SAP FICO Techno Functional Consultant with implementation and Support Project Experience. Worked as a Module Lead in Ernst & Young Pvt Ltd with a client facing role at onsite from Dec-12 to Jun-13 
 
•	A SAP FICO Techno Functional Consultant with implementation, and Support Project Experience. Worked as a Senior FICO Consultant with IBM India Pvt Ltd from Jan-11 to Dec-12. 
 
•	A SAP FICO Functional Consultant with implementation, and Support Project Experience. Worked as a FICO Consultant with Siemens from Jun-10 to Dec-10. 
 
•	Have client side implementation experience starting from blue printing.  
 
•	Instrumental with solely handling clients and offering solutions 
 
•	Have excellent COPA, Product costing hands-on implementation experience and cost center accounting. 
 
•	Brief understanding and integration of CIN, Withholding tax and Sales tax. 
 
•	Handled FI related issues and I was involved with configuration activities, integration across modules. 
 
•	Taken part of technical debugging to analyze the issue. 
 
•	Worked on LSMW to mass upload the Asset master data from flat file from presentation server 
 
•	As an offshore team member I was deeply involved with client interaction and requirement understanding. 
 
•	Prepared AS-IS and TO-BE system process documentation for that we have several client communication and meeting to understand and analyze the actual system flow.  
 
•	Analyze how the configuration will be done and how it will be tested. 
 
•	Analyze business scenarios and R/3 transactions to be realized in the system 
 
•	Providing rapid and error free solutions to the assigned service request. 
 
•	Provided the solution of FI/Co related issues and take part in configuration activities, Master Data creation (organizational Unit).  
 
•	Analyzing impact of changes across modules/functional areas and on end users. 
 
•	Worked for integration with FI-MM, FI-SD, FI-PP, FI-PP-Product costing with COPA and Cost Center accounting. Summary I do specialize in Financial and Managerial accounting processes by redesigning and improving existing systems / implementing new processes in SAP FI and CO modules with extensive experience in Food and Beverage FMCG, Chemical, Telecom,recycling and industrial waste management industries. 
Specialties: Experience with functionalities relevant for New GL, Asset accounting (including new asset accounting), CRM, Sales, Production and Logistical processes integrating with Finance and controlling areas. I do specialize in the areas of COPA, Cost object controlling, PS and Overhead accounting.  
 
Currently I am gaining knowledge and experience in the new Simple Finance products including Fiori. 
 
A very highly motivated, energetic, result driven professional who is determined and have a let’s-do-it attitude. Also part of Art of Living community where I practice and teach mediation and Yoga. I love traveling, and Photography. Summary Kelvin is currently the IBS Solution Lead for KPMG ASPAC RDC, responsible for Solutions and Development Quality for Regional Rollouts. Prior to that, he was mostly involved in designing or rolling out global templates in 4 continents and more than 15 countries. He played diverse roles as Project Manager, Solution Architect, FICO Lead Consultant, Migration Lead and Abap Lead. He has 15 years of consulting experience, 9 of which are with the aerospace industry. In the 15 years, he was involved in 10 end to end implementations, played support role in 2 instances and had extensive leadership roles in most of the projects. He has deep manufacturing experience, skilled in business process re-engineering, excellent knowledge in IFRS/US GAAP, and possess extensive functional/technical expertise in SAP. As a Fellow of The Association of Chartered Certified Accountants, he is constantly kept abreast of the latest developments in the Accounting community.
